title-group.article-title: CHARACTER SUMS AND DETERMINISTIC POLYNOMIAL ROOT FINDING IN FINITE FIELDS

abstract.p: We obtain a new bound of certain double multiplicative character sums. We use this bound together with some other previously obtained results to obtain new algorithms for finding roots of polynomials modulo a prime p.
